sen.j: 下鴨中通（しもがもなかどおり）は京都市左京区の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shimogamo-naka-doori street is one of the streets running from north to south in Sakyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Shimogamo-naka-doori street is a street running north - south in Sakyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Shimogamo Naka-dori Street is a street running north - south in Sakyo Ward in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 北山通から、下鴨本通と御蔭通の交差点まで。
sen.e: Shimogamo-naka-doori street runs from a point on Kitayama-doori street to the crossing of Shimogamo-hon-doori street and Mikage-doori street.
Shimogamo-naka-doori street runs from a point on Kitayama-doori street to the intersection between Shimogamo-hon-doori street and Mikage-doori street.
Shimogamo Naka-dori Street runs from a point on Kitayama-dori Street to the intersection between Shimogamo Hon-dori Street and Mikage-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Shimogamo Naka-dori Street, Kitayama-dori Street, Shimogamo Hon-dori Street, Mikage-dori Streetに修正

sen.j: 北大路通から御蔭通の間は南行一方通行である。
sen.e: Only southward one-way traffic is allowed in a section of Shimogamo-naka-doori from a point on Kitaoji-doori street and a point on Mikage-doori street.
Only south bound one-way traffic is allowed in a section of Shimogamo-naka-doori from a point on Kitaoji-doori street to a point on Mikage-doori street.
Only south bound one-way traffic is allowed in a section of Shimogamo Naka-dori Street from a point on Kitaoji-dori Street to a point on Mikage-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Shimogamo Naka-dori Street, Kitaoji-dori Street, Mikage-dori Streetに修正

sen.j: 沿道は住宅街だが、北山通から北大路通に至るまでは資料館、コンサートホール、大学など文化施設が並ぶ。
sen.e: The area along Shimogamo-naka-doori is a residential area while many cultural facilities such as reference museums, concert halls, and universities line a section of the street from a point on Kitayama-doori street to a point on Kitaoji-doori street.

The area along Shimogamo-naka-doori is a residential area while many cultural facilities such as reference museums, concert halls, and universities line a section of the street from a point on Kitayama-doori street to a point on Kitaoji-doori street.

The area along Shimogamo Naka-dori Street is a residential area while many cultural facilities such as reference museums, concert halls, and universities line a section of the street from a point on Kitayama-dori Street to a point on Kitaoji-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Shimogamo Naka-dori Street, Kitayama-dori Street, Kitaoji-dori Streetに修正

sen.j: 鞍馬口通以北は鞍馬街道と重複区間である。
sen.e: A section of Shimogamo-naka-doori in the north of a point on Kuramaguchi-doori is a section which overlaps Kurama-kaido road.
A section of Shimogamo-naka-doori north of Kuramaguchi-doori overlaps Kurama-kaido road.
A section of Shimogamo Naka-dori Street north of Kuramaguchi-dori Street overlaps Kurama-kaido road.
sen.cmt: Shimogamo Naka-dori Street, Kuramaguchi-dori Streetとしました。

sen.e: Main facilities along Shimogamo-naka-doori street
Main facilities along Shimogamo-naka-doori street
Main Facilities along Shimogamo Naka-dori Street
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更、Shimogamo Naka-dori Streetとしました。

sen.e: Kitayama Station (in Kyoto Prefecture)
Kitayama Station (in Kyoto Prefecture)
Kitayama Station (in Kyoto Prefecture)
Kyoto Prefectural General Reference Museum
Kyoto Prefectural General Reference Museum
Kyoto Prefectural General Reference Museum

sen.j: 京都コンサートホール
sen.e: Kyoto Concert Hall
Kyoto Concert Hall
Kyoto Concert Hall
Kyoto Prefectural University
Kyoto Prefectural University
Kyoto Prefectural University

sen.j: 賀茂御祖神社（下鴨神社）
sen.e: Kamo Mioya-jinja Shrine (Shimogamo-jinja Shrine)
